Replace.value: This talent will prevent max stacks of Regeneration Ampule Injection from killing you, and will instead disable the healing effect at 4+ stacks, giving you one final chance at life.
Pine Crane heals all bleeding and some bloodloss on self and applies a large amount of bleeding to the enemy.
Susuki Grass applies a large amount of Tremor and a brief stun effect to the enemy, then applies Adrenaline Rush on self.
Blue Sakura converts Tremor into Tremor: Decay, reducing the enemy's damage resistance based on how much Tremor they have.
